name: SMB Share Enumeration
author: hdm <x@hdm.io>
nebulus
sinn3r <sinn3r@metasploit.com>
r3dy
altonjx
description:
This module determines what shares are provided by the SMB service and which ones
        are readable/writable. It also collects additional information such as share types,
        directories, files, time stamps, etc.

        By default, a netshareenum request is done in order to retrieve share information,
        but if this fails, you may also fall back to SRVSVC.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: VERBOSE
options.description: Enable detailed status messages

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: SSL
options.description: Negotiate SSL/TLS for outgoing connections

options.name: SSLVersion
options.description: Specify the version of SSL/TLS to be used (Auto, TLS and SSL23 are auto-negotiate) (Accepted: Auto, TLS, SSL23, SSL3, TLS1, TLS1.1, TLS1.2)

options.name: SSLVerifyMode
options.description: SSL verification method (Accepted: CLIENT_ONCE, FAIL_IF_NO_PEER_CERT, NONE, PEER)

options.name: SSLCipher
options.description: String for SSL cipher - "DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA" or "ADH"

options.name: Proxies
options.description: A proxy chain of format type:host:port[,type:host:port][...]

options.name: CPORT
options.description: The local client port

options.name: CHOST
options.description: The local client address

options.name: ConnectTimeout
options.description: Maximum number of seconds to establish a TCP connection

options.name: TCP::max_send_size
options.description: Maxiumum tcp segment size.  (0 = disable)

options.name: TCP::send_delay
options.description: Delays inserted before every send.  (0 = disable)

options.name: NTLM::UseNTLMv2
options.description: Use NTLMv2 instead of NTLM2_session when 'Negotiate NTLM2' key is true

options.name: NTLM::UseNTLM2_session
options.description: Activate the 'Negotiate NTLM2 key' flag, forcing the use of a NTLMv2_session

options.name: NTLM::SendLM
options.description: Always send the LANMAN response (except when NTLMv2_session is specified)

options.name: NTLM::UseLMKey
options.description: Activate the 'Negotiate Lan Manager Key' flag, using the LM key when the LM response is sent

options.name: NTLM::SendNTLM
options.description: Activate the 'Negotiate NTLM key' flag, indicating the use of NTLM responses

options.name: NTLM::SendSPN
options.description: Send an avp of type SPN in the ntlmv2 client blob, this allows authentication on Windows 7+/Server 2008 R2+ when SPN is required

options.name: SMB::pipe_evasion
options.description: Enable segmented read/writes for SMB Pipes

options.name: SMB::pipe_write_min_size
options.description: Minimum buffer size for pipe writes

options.name: SMB::pipe_write_max_size
options.description: Maximum buffer size for pipe writes

options.name: SMB::pipe_read_min_size
options.description: Minimum buffer size for pipe reads

options.name: SMB::pipe_read_max_size
options.description: Maximum buffer size for pipe reads

options.name: SMB::pad_data_level
options.description: Place extra padding between headers and data (level 0-3)

options.name: SMB::pad_file_level
options.description: Obscure path names used in open/create (level 0-3)

options.name: SMB::obscure_trans_pipe_level
options.description: Obscure PIPE string in TransNamedPipe (level 0-3)

options.name: SMBDirect
options.description: The target port is a raw SMB service (not NetBIOS)

options.name: SMBUser
options.description: The username to authenticate as

options.name: SMBPass
options.description: The password for the specified username

options.name: SMBDomain
options.description: The Windows domain to use for authentication

options.name: SMBName
options.description: The NetBIOS hostname (required for port 139 connections)

options.name: SMB::VerifySignature
options.description: Enforces client-side verification of server response signatures

options.name: SMB::ChunkSize
options.description: The chunk size for SMB segments, bigger values will increase speed but break NT 4.0 and SMB signing

options.name: SMB::Native_OS
options.description: The Native OS to send during authentication

options.name: SMB::Native_LM
options.description: The Native LM to send during authentication

options.name: DCERPC::max_frag_size
options.description: Set the DCERPC packet fragmentation size

options.name: DCERPC::fake_bind_multi
options.description: Use multi-context bind calls

options.name: DCERPC::fake_bind_multi_prepend
options.description: Set the number of UUIDs to prepend before the target

options.name: DCERPC::fake_bind_multi_append
options.description: Set the number of UUIDs to append the target

options.name: DCERPC::smb_pipeio
options.description: Use a different delivery method for accessing named pipes (Accepted: rw, trans)

options.name: DCERPC::ReadTimeout
options.description: The number of seconds to wait for DCERPC responses

options.name: THREADS
options.description: The number of concurrent threads (max one per host)

options.name: ShowProgress
options.description: Display progress messages during a scan

options.name: ShowProgressPercent
options.description: The interval in percent that progress should be shown

options.name: SpiderShares
options.description: Spider shares recursively

options.name: ShowFiles
options.description: Show detailed information when spidering

options.name: SpiderProfiles
options.description: Spider only user profiles when share = C$

options.name: LogSpider
options.description: 0 = disabled, 1 = CSV, 2 = table (txt), 3 = one liner (txt) (Accepted: 0, 1, 2, 3)

options.name: MaxDepth
options.description: Max number of subdirectories to spider
